Articles.Content:
First of all let me say That this game is the most brilliant game I have seen in many years. I guess game is not so much true as Simulation. Either way... you are developing a Fan Boy here.

I have landed on the Mun and Minmus. Btw, minmus looks a ton like a Green snowball...

Building the rockets and watching them sucessfully fly (or not) is incredible. As a C# programmer I do plan on making some mods but right now I am so damned happy building crafts.

Anyways, Hi and hope you all are enjoying the ga... sim as much as I am

FlyMario
Welcome flymario! Well, I hope you love this game as much as all of us do! Also, Have fun making mods!

Welcome to the forums!

I am also a C# programmer and have 1.5 years experience. But I got stuck, I want to build a 2D game, but I really don't know how XNA works. And the javascript game engines are all a bit difficult.

*2 years later*

Probably not 1.5 years intensive experience.

But I knew how to code things from scratch decen-ish

Edited April 27, 2015 by joppiesaus

Welcome to the community FlyMario

Yeah Minmus looks like a giant ball of mint ice cream to me, luckily Kerbals aren't allowed to take their helmets off, or to carry spoons

The simulator aspect is one of the things that makes KSP so great, it rewards you for learning and for planning ahead, rather than being a simple twitch game like so many are these days.

Also it's always cool to see new addons so get coding

Have fun learning about orbital mechanics, and fly safe
